Title: Indian Political Action Committee - Lead Analyst - Tamil Nadu Media Campaign (3-7 yrs)
Description:
Tamil Nadu Media Campaign Lead Analyst

About Job :

Indian Political Action Committee (I-PAC) is seeking professionals who can play a pivotal role in the election campaign for the upcoming Tamil Nadu Assembly Elections in 2021. After making a mark in an extensive Lok Sabha election campaign and assembly election campaigns across Bihar, Punjab, Uttar Pradesh, Uttarakhand, Andhra Pradesh, Maharashtra and Delhi, I-PAC is now gearing up for the Tamil Nadu Assembly Elections. If you are interested in politics and want to experience it from the close quarters, then read on.

Job Responsibilities :

- As part of I-PAC's Media team, members are expected to perform a wide range of activities, such as media coordination, developing media briefs for campaign and candidates, documenting media feedback structures and creating a solid media network for our various projects

- We are looking for people who understand media logic, can develop and maintain a healthy network with the media at the national, state, district, and assembly level; and represent the organization or the candidate in a confident, yet humble and professional manner. You need to think on your feet and have a nose for news

- We are looking for someone who is open to working long hours, sometimes all days of the week especially during campaigns; and flexible to move across multiple geographies if the situation so demands

Why Should You Apply?

- Mass-scale operations: Every campaign at I-PAC is crafted to engage millions of people, providing one a platform to interact, work and operate on a mass-scale;

- Impact-oriented: I-PAC's campaigns are agenda-specific, based on direct feedback from millions of citizens, with an aim to bring about a real difference in their lives. Our previous flagship initiatives across geographies such as Nitish Ke Saat Nischay, Captain De Nau Nukte, Aditya Samvad are a testament to this belief;

- Work with like-minded individuals: I-PAC's employees come from various backgrounds, offering one an opportunity to work in a diverse team;

- Work across various units: I-PAC's employees are offered the unique opportunity to indulge in a spectrum of activities with various units within the company;

- Grassroots experience: I-PAC provides a one-of-a-kind opportunity to experience the ground reality by involving its employees in strategizing, planning, and executing high impact on-ground campaigns;

- Political exposure: At I-PAC, one gets to experience and impact the political discourse; and attain knowledge and expertise in various processes associated with electioneering.

WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR?

- Prior experience in prominent Tamil Media Houses/ English Media House or Public Relations role is a must

- Should have a network with the State Media

- Someone who understands media logic can develop and maintain a healthy network with the media at national, state and district level

- Dynamic individual with strong academic records (graduation/post-graduation) from premier institutions

- Minimum 3 years of experience in media consulting and should have worked in top media organizations in the past

- Should be proficient in media structures, political landscape, and current affairs

- Should be able to plan, manage, and implement media campaigns & create content as well as coordinate and work with multiple teams

- Keen interest in politics and political change-making

- Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment, solving complex problems on an everyday basis, and the tenacity to meet tight deadlines

- Excellent analytical skills and the ability to translate raw information into actionable strategies and initiatives

- Excellent communication skills in Tamil & English

Location: Base location to be out of Chennai, however, the candidate could be asked to relocate to other metros if necessary.

About us:

MobiKwik is India's largest independent mobile payments network connecting 107 million users with more than 3 million direct merchants. It enables users to discover retailers (brick-and-mortar stores, e-com websites, m-com apps, billers, telcos) and then start paying them with 1-tap.

MobiKwik is powering payments for IRCTC, Uber, Meru Cabs, Shuttl, Big Bazaar, OYO Rooms, Zomato, Barista, PVR, Archies, WHSmith India, BookMyShow, Grofers, Big Basket, Domino's, Pizza Hut, eBay, ShopClues, Myntra, Jabong, Pepperfry, GoDaddy, MakeMyTrip, Cleartrip, and Yatra. The company has raised funding from Sequoia Capital, American Express, Tree Line Asia, and Cisco Investments.

With MobiKwik, users load money into the wallet once using cash, loyalty points, debit card, credit card, and netbanking to make secure 1-tap payments for online or offline purchases. Most MobiKwik users make 10-12 purchases every month using their wallet balance across diverse use cases such as recharge, bills, food, grocery, travel & cabs, shopping, entertainment, etc. Users can also make bank to bank transfers via UPI to friends and family using MobiKwik. Users today enjoy MobiKwik wallet services on Android, Windows, and iOS mobile applications and on MobiKwik.com.

MobiKwik aspires to be the largest source of digital transactions in India.
